CreatePerformanceAnalysisReport.name: CreatePerformanceAnalysisReport
CreatePerformanceAnalysisReport.description: Grants permission to call CreatePerformanceAnalysisReport API to create a Performance Analysis Report for a specified DB instance

DeletePerformanceAnalysisReport.name: DeletePerformanceAnalysisReport
DeletePerformanceAnalysisReport.description: Grants permission to call DeletePerformanceAnalysisReport API to delete a Performance Analysis Report for a specified DB instance

DescribeDimensionKeys.name: DescribeDimensionKeys
DescribeDimensionKeys.description: Grants permission to call DescribeDimensionKeys API to retrieve the top N dimension keys for a metric for a specific time period

GetDimensionKeyDetails.name: GetDimensionKeyDetails
GetDimensionKeyDetails.description: Grants permission to call GetDimensionKeyDetails API to retrieve the attributes of the specified dimension group

GetPerformanceAnalysisReport.name: GetPerformanceAnalysisReport
GetPerformanceAnalysisReport.description: Grants permission to call GetPerformanceAnalysisReport API to retrieve a Performance Analysis Report for a specified DB instance

GetResourceMetadata.name: GetResourceMetadata
GetResourceMetadata.description: Grants permission to call GetResourceMetadata API to retrieve the metadata for different features

GetResourceMetrics.name: GetResourceMetrics
GetResourceMetrics.description: Grants permission to call GetResourceMetrics API to retrieve PI metrics for a set of data sources, over a time period

ListAvailableResourceDimensions.name: ListAvailableResourceDimensions
ListAvailableResourceDimensions.description: Grants permission to call ListAvailableResourceDimensions API to retrieve the dimensions that can be queried for each specified metric type on a specified DB instance

ListAvailableResourceMetrics.name: ListAvailableResourceMetrics
ListAvailableResourceMetrics.description: Grants permission to call ListAvailableResourceMetrics API to retrieve metrics of the specified types that can be queried for a specified DB instance

ListPerformanceAnalysisReports.name: ListPerformanceAnalysisReports
ListPerformanceAnalysisReports.description: Grants permission to call ListPerformanceAnalysisReports API to list Performance Analysis Reports for a specified DB instance

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to call ListTagsForResource API to list tags for a resource

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to call TagResource API to tag a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to call UntagResource API to untag a resource
